title: A possible change to the Stats feature
body: So I have been looking through the new stats feature and I noticed that some of the categories are a little bit vague like "damage per gold" for example. I thought it might be a good idea to make it so when you hover over a statistic some text will come up in the bottom right to explain what this is and how it is calculated. Please upvote if you agree.

replies.body: there is a little explanation when you hover over the title of the statistic.
